scripts.clean: pnpm recursive exec -- rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf node_modules
scripts.demo:build: pnpm run plugin:build && pnpm --filter ./examples/demo/ run build
scripts.demo:dev: pnpm run plugin:build && pnpm --filter ./examples/demo/ run dev
scripts.demo-ssg:build: pnpm run plugin:build && pnpm --filter ./examples/demo-ssg/ run build
scripts.demo-ssg:dev: pnpm run plugin:build && pnpm --filter ./examples/demo-ssg/ run dev
